column1: Kata Robata////Kata Robata is my all time favorite restaurant in Houston. Everything I've had here
column2: ranging from their yuzu salmon sashimi to lobster mac and cheese
column3: has been good if not great. They also have my favorite dessert of all time: green tea souffle cheesecake. I wish I could come here more but it is a bit pricey (but definitely worth it).
